Package com.pizzaMakerApp.config

Interface DBConfig

public interface DBConfig
Interface representing the configuration for connecting to the Pizza Maker application database. Defines constants for the database URL, user credentials, and driver class.

Example usage: 

 
 String url = DBConfig.URL;
 String user = DBConfig.USER;
 String password = DBConfig.PASSWORD;
 String driver = DBConfig.DRIVER;

The interface includes the following constants:

  • URL: The URL for connecting to the database.
  • USER: The username for authenticating with the database.
  • PASSWORD: The password for authenticating with the database.
  • DRIVER: The JDBC driver class for the database.

See Also:
